column17:
Toning up will become more fun with this sports footwear created by the house of Gola. Given its classic colour combination of black and green these shoes will go nicely with any of the sports wear or gym wear. The usage of faux leather and mesh would give you a comfortable extended wear.

Style Tips
While going for a workout wear the shoes along with track pants capris or shorts and a T-shirt.
You can also get into this footwear while going for a casual outing. Wear it under a pair of jeans and a casual T-shirt.
